subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Marlon Byrd agreed Tuesday to a two-year, $16 million deal with the Philadelphia Phillies, becoming the latest player to capitalize on solid showings with bad Mets teams to land a better deal elsewhere.
snippet: Marlon Byrd agreed Tuesday to a two-year, $16 million deal with the Philadelphia Phillies, becoming the latest player to capitalize on solid showings with bad Mets teams to land a better deal elsewhere.
